name: NBA Clash: Basketball Game
summary: Introducing NBA Clash, the fast-paced head-to-head game that will have you hooked on basketball like never before! School your opponents with quick drives to the basket, long-range 3-pointers, and explosive dunks. As you climb the leaderboards, unlock new NBA Stars to add to your ideal team. Set your lineup and execute the best strategy to dominate the competition and become the ultimate NBA Clash champion!
